knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r, include=FALSE, eval = TRUE}

fp <- "../../packages.csv"

attached <- installed.packages()[names(sessionInfo()$otherPkgs), "Version"]
thesepkgs <- data.frame(package  = names(attached),
                   version = attached)

if(file.exists(fp)) {
  
  pkgs <- read.csv(fp)
  
  pkgs <- 
    rbind(pkgs, thesepkgs)
  
  pkgs <- pkgs[!duplicated(pkgs),]
  
} else{
  
  pkgs <- thesepkgs
  
}

write.csv(pkgs, 
          file = fp,
          append = TRUE, 
          row.names = FALSE)
```
